response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure this item at a price slightly above its cost, allowing you to enjoy its full potential without a significant financial burden. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product.", "product_price": 9500}
